overview: A guy finds himself isolated in his apartment due to a pandemic. Lonely and without the social life, the “imprisoned man” recognizes in himself a potential questioner. In the early hours, little by little, he starts to break with the “civility uniforms” that society imposes it and face moral and ethical dilemmas that it previously avoided. in a world new and unknown, what challenges will need to be overcome for the “dawn” of a new subject?
title: Amanhecer, o despertar do sujeito
